mapper.insert: insert into t_article(title, userId, typeId, content, created_time) values(#{title}, #{userId}, #{typeId}, #{content}, #{createdTime})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.title, a.first_img as firstImg, a.content, a.created_time, a.modify_time, a.status, t.type_name as typeName, u.id as userId, u.name as author from t_article a, t_type t, t_user u where a.typeId = t.id and a.userId = u.id and a.id = #{id}

select a.id, a.title, a.first_img as firstImg, a.content, a.created_time, a.modify_time, a.status, t.type_name as typeName, u.id as userId, u.name as author from t_article a, t_type t, t_user u where a.typeId = t.id and a.userId = u.id limit #{beginIndex}, #{pageSize}
select count(a.id) from t_article a, t_type t, t_user u where a.typeId = t.id and a.userId = u.id
